Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-red; cream slip. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '179'. Name Aleximachos. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 046.07.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (13)
